name: The Witch's Hut (Environment Showcase)
description:
This is a personal project I started to practice environmental design and technical art in Unity. Completed in about 4 weeks, using Unity 2019.3 and the Universal Render Pipeline. Also using the Visual Effects Graph and the integrated Post Processing Stack.

Models and textures were downloaded from sites like Sketchfab. Full credits for all used assets can be found ingame!

To toggle the ingame menu press either Escape, Tab or the M key!
